>   Yeah, been told this. I get the impression there's some joining this
> group hoping to get their ghost huntng or spirit beliefs validated, or
> confirmed, when they hear this junk they bail. This stuff is ITC,
> Instrumental Trans-Communication. That can be audio, video, or still images.
> I think there is a mis-conception in the paranormal whatever world that EVP
> is ghost voice, weak whispery barely audible noise, and ITC is video
> feedback loop images, an never shall the two ever, ever mix. Some seem to
> think it's all perfectly well defined and laid down in laws and protocols.
> Afterall it's repeated on TV week after weak after week.
>
>  I managed to completely offend the guy that told me about the embedded
> images, Richard Roberts. He started laying down all these absolute
> undeniabel laws and definitions of EVP, and when I disagreed openly, he got
> all pissed off, deleted all his Facebook content, and went away, sulking in
> some dark internet corner I guess. I feel bad about offending him, but come
> on! Grow up out there.
>
>  Think I'll replace the tuner in this box, too frikin' noisy. I don't have
> tuners to spare, but this one is unacceptabel.
>
>  F-S
>
>
